definition: inner feelings/what is deep in one's heart

sentences.english: Shakespeare' s sonnets are the only direct expression of the poet' s own feelings.
sentences.chinese: 這些十四行詩都是莎翁直抒胸臆的成果。

sentences.english: Pouring out the heart is exactly the writing style of this writer.
sentences.chinese: 這種直抒胸臆的寫法正是這位作家的風格。

sentences.english: Americans talk like their poems, as soon as possible into the topic, won't beat around the bush.
sentences.chinese: 美國人說話喜歡直抒胸臆，儘快入題，不會拐彎抹角。

sentences.english: When was the last time you had a gut feeling about someone?
sentences.chinese: 最後一次是什麼時候當你敢直抒胸臆？

sentences.english: Shakespeare's sonnets are the only direct expression_r of the poet's own feelings.
sentences.chinese: 這些十四行詩都是莎翁直抒胸臆的成果。

definition: congestion/to block/to congest/to crowd/to choke/to cram/to fill up/to stuff/to take up all the space
to express/to give expression to/variant of 紓|纾[shu1]/to relieve
pent-up frustrations/sth that has accumulated in one's mind for a long time
to be unable (to do sth)/no reason to .../without rhyme or reason
